Button
Author: Mohamed Attia
Search What are you looking for? Android App Search Recipes! Ver 0.3 beta Recipe API Information
Click button to start Searching! Or click the star on the toolbar to go directly to your Favorites Input the ingredient you want to search and click on the search button. The results would be displayed in a list. This is the information about this app and the author Input the ingredient you want to search in favorite and click on the filter button. The results would be displayed in list. Long click can delete it from favorite. Click the heart button to delete the recipe from your favorite Click the heart button to add the recipe to your favorite
open navigation drawer close navigation drawer About me This application, developed as the culmination of CST2335 by Mohamed Attia, \n\nThe app is for recipe searching. By entering an ingredient in the search bar, it will generate the search result. You can add it to your favorite for later use. The app has also an about me page as well as help to guide the use of the app.
Search My Favorite Information Recipe Search by ingredient Search in my favourite Filter You\'re at home! You\'re searching! I\'m your favorite! You\'re in the information page!
